name: loudness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of making a lot of noise, or the amount of noise something or someone makes: The loudness of their arguing worried me, but then I realized that they were just excited. Differences in loudness are measured in decibels. See
loud
More examplesFewer examplesShe was a refreshing blend of confidence, loudness, and charm.His increasing deafness is not due to the loudness of the crowd at concerts, but to studio headphones. The increase in loudness was gradual.
